name: Upsqueak
description:
Upsqueak is a chaos and destruction simulator. For far too long, the smaller creatures have been treated unjustly. The time has come for the fury of "the pest" to unleash itself back on the oppressors!

Upsqueak uses upbeat music and cute sprite art to mask the true horror of a medieval village being destroyed in unimaginable ways.

Controls:

  • A/D or Left/Right to move.
  • Space to smash.

Everything created in 3 hours flat for Trijam #73.
